original_text: And the Lord was with Joseph, and he was a prosperous man; and he was in the house of his master the Egyptian.
korean_text: 여호와께서 요셉과 함께 하시므로 그가 형통한 자가 되어 그의 주인 애굽 사람의 집에 있으니

sentences.original_text: And the Lord was with Joseph
and he was a prosperous man
and he was in the house of his master the Egyptian
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 주인인 이집트 사람의 집에 있었다
